categories: Category:Star Wars: Age of Rebellion (comic series)

nodes.text: Star Wars: Age of Rebellion — Villains

Star Wars: Age of Rebellion — Villains is a canon trade paperback that collects four issues of the comic-book series Star Wars: Age of Rebellion from author Greg Pak, as well as the comic story "The Long Game" from Age of Rebellion Special 1 by author Simon Spurrier. It was published by Marvel Comics on September 3, 2019.

Writer Greg Pak (WEAPON H and WEAPON X) teams up with artists Chris Sprouse (BLACK PANTHER) and more to tell stunning adventures starring the most dangerous villains from the original Star Wars film trilogy. What other schemes did Grand Moff Tarkin hatch aboard the Death Star? STAR WARS: AGE OF REBELLION fills-in the gaps between and complements the fan favorite, iconic Star Wars moments, shedding new light on the films' eternal conflict between the light and the dark, good and evil.

COLLECTING: STAR WARS: AGE OF REBELLION - BOBA FETT 1, STAR WARS: AGE OF REBELLION - DARTH VADER 1, STAR WARS: AGE OF REBELLION - JABBA THE HUTT 1, STAR WARS: AGE OF REBELLION - WILHUFF TARKIN 1, STAR WARS: AGE OF REBELLION SPECIAL 1
